description: Cloudinary is a cloud-based image and video management platform that allows you to upload, store, manage, and deliver your media assets. It provides a range of features for image and video optimization, transformation, and delivery.

actions.name: createUsageReport
actions.description: Generate a comprehensive report of account usage and quotas including storage, bandwidth, transformations, requests, and add-on usage.

actions.name: deleteResource
actions.description: Permanently delete images, videos, or files from Cloudinary.

actions.name: findResourceByPublicId
actions.description: Retrieve details of an asset using its unique public ID.

actions.name: transformResource
actions.description: Apply transformations (resize, crop, watermark, etc.) to an asset and generate a new URL.

actions.name: uploadResource
actions.description: Upload a new image, video, or file to Cloudinary.

triggers.name: new_resource
triggers.description: The Cloudinary folder to watch for new resources. Leave empty to watch the entire account.

triggers.name: new_tag_added_to_asset
triggers.description: The type of resources to monitor for tag changes
